timeline.message: Add assertj helpers for asserting traces and expose from the junit5 helper.

timeline.bodyText: Since it's a testing helper, I think we can assume user's won't try to trick the compiler with a bad array.
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText: I think you mean: Users will certainly try to trick the compiler with a bad array.  😆
